title: 文字游戏《丧尸大逃亡》
author: herobrineNPC
txt_content:
你是在Minecraft中的一只。
         A:僵尸
         B:苦力怕
         C:骷髅射手
         D:蜘蛛

replies.author: 神奇的人
replies.txt_content: c猥琐射击

replies.author: 真-zyj
replies.txt_content: 看我头像不解释

replies.author: 冬日祭
replies.txt_content: A:僵尸

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 你刚来到这个世界，长大后才知道人类这种可怕的生物。A去杀他B躲开他

replies.author: MC猪人
replies.txt_content: 玩家

replies.author: 苦力怕·炸你
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 苦力怕·炸你 于 2014-2-11 16:51 编辑 

爆炸爬墙僵尸射手(ABCD混合~)

replies.author: zjr_516635864
replies.txt_content: 这里是论坛不是贴吧请不要玩这种游戏.

replies.author: key123
replies.txt_content: E：HIM    或者   F：史蒂夫

replies.author: 真-zyj
replies.txt_content:
苦力怕·炸你 发表于 2014-2-11 16:43
爆炸僵尸射手(ABC混合~)
爆炸爬墙僵尸射手不是更好么

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 选A的和别的怪物一样死去。选B的躲在山洞，继续。

replies.author: key123
replies.txt_content:
herobrineNPC 发表于 2014-2-11 16:42
你刚来到这个世界，长大后才知道人类这种可怕的生物。A去杀他B躲开他
有C吗- -

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 有一天，你在山洞里。有一个玩家拿着石镐进来。A躲在他头顶上挖个洞，偷袭他B跑

replies.author: 狂风※中箭
replies.txt_content: c吧。A太慢，b一次性炸弹，d我超讨厌（现实中）

replies.author: 狂风※中箭
橡皮233
replies.txt_content: 楼主，你来骗回复了？

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 选A的把他杀了，选B的被他杀了。

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 你越来越害怕，心神不宁。A:磊建堡垒B:逃走了。

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 有人吗？

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 哈咯?请回话，有木有人?有就回话?

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 选A的被两三个穿铁甲群欧而死。选B的从废弃矿洞走后他乡。

replies.author: 苦力怕kk
replies.txt_content: 楼主你的节操呢

replies.author: 进击的凋零
replies.txt_content: 楼主快恢复

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 你走着，走着。看见了Herobrine。A:不理他B:找他帮助

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 选A继续走。选B的最后还是被史提夫杀死

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 你走到了一个玩家后。A:杀了他B:躲开

replies.author: 洪一峰
replies.txt_content: aaaaaaaaaaadangranxuanaa

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 哈楼主我又回来了。

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 选A活下来又杀了他。选B的挡住光，被杀了

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 你发现他有个箱子。A打开B不理

replies.author: 不是游客
replies.txt_content:
herobrineNPC 发表于 5 分钟前 
你发现他有个箱子。A打开B不理
B呢就是

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 你要选B?

replies.author: 不是游客
replies.txt_content: 我就选B

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 选A的有了铁盔甲。B吗？不淘太就是好的了。(铁甲可加二命)

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 你有了盔甲很得意。A上去，B继续

replies.author: 不是游客
replies.txt_content: 我要选b

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 有人没没没没没没没没

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 大锅，我给你机会重选行不?

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: A继续，B被Herobrine虐待

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 你来到他的家，捡到钻石剑。A去杀他B夫开门

replies.author: 名字真难搞
replies.txt_content: d吧，白天s不了

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 可惜，那是大街，你是过街老鼠。A继续

replies.author: herobrineNPC
replies.txt_content: 你捡到钻石甲。A出去B回去
